```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv("/Users/sophialeeman/Documents/BME 580/BME-580/Aggregate_Data.csv")
data <- data[,2:ncol(data)]
```

```{r, fig.align = "center", fig.height = 8, fig.width = 8,out.width = "8.5in"}
library(corrplot)
colnames(data) <- c("Diastolic BP", "Systolic BP", "Heart Rate", "BPM", "Mean RR", "MxDMn", "SDNN", "rMSSD", "PNN50", "Moda", "AMo50", "LF", "HF", "VLF", "LF/HF", "Total Power", "Height", "Weight", "Age Range", "Mental Health Severity", "Temperature", "Atmospheric Pressure", "Precipitation Intensity", "Humidity", "Clouds")
C = cor(data)
corrplot(C, tl.cex = 2.5, cl.cex = 2)

```
```{r, fig.align = "center", fig.height = 8, fig.width = 8,out.width = "8.5in"}
corrplot(C, method = "number")

```
